required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Immediate Effect of Subliminal Priming With Subliminal Reward Stimuli on Standing Balance in Healthy Young Adults
clinical_study.official_title: Immediate Effect of Subliminal Priming With Subliminal Reward Stimuli on Standing Balance in Healthy Young Adults: A Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study was to examine the immediate effect of subliminal priming with subliminal reward stimuli on standing balance in healthy young adults. The study also compared the outcomes with the immediate effects of subliminal priming with supraliminal reward stimuli.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in the dynamic standing balance
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and immediately after the intervention protocol
primary_outcome.description: Dynamic standing balance as measured by the Functional Reach Test

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the static standing balance
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and immediately after the intervention protocol
secondary_outcome.description: Static standing balance as measured by the One-leg standing time with the eyes closed (maximum of 120 seconds)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Subliminal priming with subliminal reward stimuli
arm_group.description: This intervention consisted of five presentations [three cycles of mosaic (displayed for 117 ms each), physical exertion words as subliminal priming (displayed for 17 ms), and positive words as subliminal reward (displayed for 17 ms)]. These were set to 1 package. 1 package is 24 times per 5 seconds presented in the animation (Animation of Skateboarding) for approximately 2 min.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Subliminal priming with supraliminal reward stimuli
arm_group.description: This intervention consisted of four presentations [two cycles of mosaic (displayed for 117 ms each), physical exertion words as subliminal prime (displayed for 17 ms), and positive words as supraliminal reward (displayed for 150 ms)]. These were set to 1 package. 1 package is 24 times per 5 seconds presented in the animation (Animation of Skateboarding) for approximately 2 min.

intervention.intervention_name: Subliminal priming with subliminal reward stimuli
intervention.description: Positive words as subliminal reward (displayed for 17 ms).
intervention.arm_group_label: Subliminal priming with subliminal reward stimuli

intervention.intervention_name: Subliminal priming with supraliminal reward stimuli
intervention.description: Positive words as supraliminal reward (displayed for 150 ms).
intervention.arm_group_label: Subliminal priming with supraliminal reward stimuli

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Healthy volunteers between 18 and 24 years of age
2. Males and Females
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Physical impairment, hindering performance of daily activities
